page.title: 17RAILWAYS IN THE OAKLEY AREA
page.content: Until{1964}the local railway was used as a{passenger line}.After that it was used as a line for carrying coal which was taken to{Longannet powerstation from the nearby mines.Since the miners' strike the railway has been closed down completely and lorries carry the coal instead.These lorries, carrying very heavy loads,now pass through the village of{Oakley}very regularly{.The local people are {concerned}about them damaging the roads and the vibrations shaking the houses.They are also very worried about the danger to their children.
